website_summaries.verdict: If you own an iPod or iPhone and tend to listen to music with the bass EQ cranked all the way up, the IDR655m headphones are easy to recommend. For sonic versatility, look elsewhere.
pros: The IDR655m in-ear headphones from Scosche offer ear-whopping fistfuls of bass, along with an inline remote and mic, a shirt clip, a generous selection of ear tips, and a classy leather carrying case
cons: The unapologetically bass-heavy sound isn't flattering for some types of music, and unlike an EQ preset, there's no switching it off

customer_reviews.title: SUKS IF YOU NEED VOLUME CONTROL UP/DOWN
customer_reviews.text: USELESS FOR MY MP3 PLAYER UNLESS U ONLY NEED IT FOR AUDIBLE, NO CONTROL FOR FEATURES PERIOD!!! (may work 4 yours...but hey...Its your money)... ON MY SAMSUNG GALAXY S8 ....NO VOLUME CONTROL FOR UP/DOWN....THOU PAUSE, FORWARD AND REVERSE WORKS GREAT.....BUT NO UP/DOWN VOLUME CONTROL...IT JUST DOESN'T WORK!!!! BUT AS FAR AS MUSIC QUALITY....AWESOME!!! ....BUT SHOULD'NT IT WORK FOR MP3 PLAYERS AS WELL??? OH WELL...CAN'T EXPECT FLAWLESS OPERATIONS FOR THE PRICE.....NOW I NEED 2 FIND ONE THAT THE FEATURES WORK ON MY MP3....
customer_reviews.author: DreamShadows

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased these Scosche headphones on the recommendation of Consumer Report magazine that I subscribe to. I couldn't believe the difference in the sound quality. I did not have to increase the volume as much while walking on my treadmill as I had to do with my previous low cost headphones. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: IAK

customer_reviews.title: Great, as long as it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted something smaller for everyday use than the RHA MA750i I usually carry when traveling. At first I was very happy with these earbuds. The sound is very clear and precise, even at low volumes. In fact the noise isolation is probably better than on the RHA. However, after 2-3 month of not particularly intensive use, i got the dreaded "one bud now plays at 1/4 volume" problem that made me shy away from Shure earbuds. I think that I will stick to Sennheiser buds when I want something compact, with microphone, iPhone-compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Yves HERVE

customer_reviews.title: My goto
customer_reviews.text: I wear them dirt biking and mountain biking...yes, I can wreck them, but in general, they preform better then expected for a long time and take plenty of abuse. Ive tried many brands...some costing much more and come back to these as a solid value.
customer_reviews.author: sylvan rocks climbing

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective... replacement from Scosche in limbo for over 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earphones due to the great reviews and its features for the iPhone. When I received the earphones, the tapline remote was useless. It didn't function at all. Additionally, the cable itself makes very loud static noise when your clothes brush on it. If you plan on sitting still while using these, then I think you'll be happy with the purchase, assuming they're functioning per design. Otherwise, keep looking. Regarding getting them replaced, Scosche handles replacements directly. Their technical support told me to mail the earphones with a copy of my receipt and only THEN would they send out a replacement item. That was over two months ago... I still have nothing other than a lack of $50.
customer_reviews.author: home6

customer_reviews.title: Beware the Cord Noise
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about the earphones. The sound is great and the tapline is very nice for the iPhone. The only problem is the cord. If the cord is completely motionless, ie you are not moving, everything is fantastic. Every time the cord brushes up against something it sounds like you are in a thunderstorm with music in the background. Some cord noise can be expected but the cord on this is horrible. The cord is very limber, flexible and appears as a braided fabric. I would return these if I could. Off to the Apple store, at least they take earphones back, within 14 days.
customer_reviews.author: lowjumpingfrog

customer_reviews.title: Best Sounding Ear Buds You Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: I will keep it short - these Scosche's are the best sounding ear buds I have ever owned (incl Bose Klipsch and many others). These have incredible bass and they do not produce that "tired ear" feeling most others do after listening for an extended time. I have not had any Scosche product break as some reviewers on Amazon have noted in their reviews. This is my second set of Scosche's, and no the first set bought a year still works great. I needed a 2nd pair to use at the gym. Seriously, these are the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Objective1

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I read what seems like a million reviews of earphones before I picked these for my 3rd Gen IPOD shuffle. The variety of rubber pieces changes the sound/bass response to your liking. Most over inflate the bass.. The center controller button sometimes does not change the playlist. When the cable is rubbed against something, there is noise into the earphones, which is kinda irritating. The sound is good, overall. I have nothing else to compare it to except the original ear hones that came with the ipod. I'd rather have larger over the ear, head phones, but these will do when exercising etc..
customer_reviews.author: Pete6737

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am an audio professional. I mix sound for Films and TV. And I'm a big music fan. I found these earbuds to be so very pleasurable to listen to. The low end is surprisingly present without being muddy or overbearing. I mean, I didn't think that earbuds or headphones could give me such satisfying bass. I thought I needed big speakers in a big room for that. And the highs are just right without being strident or tinny. And they are really comfy. I like to go to sleep listening to music and they fit in my ears just right. I can't imagine any headphone costing twice as much sounding any better than these.
customer_reviews.author: J. LeBrecht

customer_reviews.title: Love these Scosche IRD655m headphones
customer_reviews.text: The headphones have great sound, and they are comfortable in my ears. While I always thought that other headphones cords were too short these are not; they are longer than most. I also like the little clip that allows me to attach the cord to my shirt. They are comfortable in my ears, and the sound quality is fine. While some have stated that the nylon braided cord makes a noise as it brushes against clothing, I have not found this to be a problem at all as I walk or bike. You will not be sorry if you purchase these headphones. Amazon sold them for $41.95, and they sell for $99 otherwise. Good Buy!
customer_reviews.author: k.seaweed

customer_reviews.title: Superb Earphones , but still it won't work with the Iphone 3G or earlier models
customer_reviews.text: Well ,I needed something like a Bose earphone with a microphone for an iPhone, but something that isn't overpriced. I did a little bit research and finally landed Scosche. These work amazing, especially when you watch movies and you get the cinematic sound experience, precise and has a very good bass even for music listening. I could give 8/10 . It does not work with 3G or earlier models, I mean just the microphone. Everything else is good. I will be getting a better phone soon , a 4G I think, should work fine. It works fine with 3gS or later models.
customer_reviews.author: Naattik

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, mediocre construction
customer_reviews.text: I've recommended these headphones to a few friends and while the sound quality and remote/mic features were excellent and worked well, the construction quality seems to be fairly mediocre. The wires are fairly thin and seem to stretch or break over time the with several fairly light tugs that are hard to avoid when moving around the house or office. While I have don't much experience with headphones, I have a hard time recommending these when there seem to be many similarly priced alternatives that seem to last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: thrawnis

customer_reviews.title: I like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones, I've purchased them before multiple times. However, this particular pair came with the cable all twisted and knotted up it's really obnoxious and annoying to use. I'll have to like stretch it out somehow and hope it straightens out.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Shuffle Volumn and Track Adjuster
customer_reviews.text: I use the shuffle when I run. The shuffle earphones would fall out of my ears, so I bought these. I had them for 2-3 months and apparently my sweat soaked into the control pad, and I can no longer change tracks or the volume. If you are a runner and want these, I would encourage you to cover the control pad with tape (or something) or not buy this particular brand. I hate saying that b/c the sound quality is amazing. With this being said, if you just want to use these earphones for everyday use, I imagine they will do well for you.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Tomich

customer_reviews.title: lanyard protection, great sound, perfect for recent iphones and ipods.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the last pair of Scosche until i messed up the cable connecting to the jack. most headhpones w/out lanyard will start to rip or break apart from the connector part of the headphones. I got this headphone and they seem like it'll last longer..it has the lanyard protection and the sound is great...the microphone is well placed and it comes w/ a clip which my previous ones lacked and it would often get caught on my collar or on my jacket zipper. great buy for the buck. great sound for those on-the-go people and metro riders...very portable and love the little protective sack it comes with...
customer_reviews.author: LSTEELZ

customer_reviews.title: audio quality felt lacking
customer_reviews.text: Sound didn't seem to live up to the quality of the other Scosche earbuds. Could've just been a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: Great All in 1 - Sound, Ear Bud Sizes, & Control Switch for iPod Shuffle
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for ear buds for my iPod Shuffle so needed one with controls on it. While there are other options, none had the number of ear bud sizes included. I often have a problem that they are too large. However, there is a size for every ear. Sound quality also excellent for these types of earphones and price. Would recommend to other buyers with same needs.
customer_reviews.author: retired on the beach

customer_reviews.title: Not as described - unbraided cord
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty happy with a previous pair of these earphones, so when I lost them, I purchased a replacement. However, they seem to have changed the product--the cord is no longer braided, despite the descriptions on the product page (and yes, I double-checked that the model number of the package I received is the same as this listing). Now, it's a standard rubber cord. Unfortunately, this was an important feature to me, as I find the fabric-wrapped cords are easier to manage and less likely to tangle. So if this is one of the reasons you plan to buy these earphones, beware. Other than that, I liked my previous pair.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dierks

customer_reviews.title: these are really great earbuds for the iPhone!
customer_reviews.text: these are really great earbuds for the iPhone! bought them just to see if they were any good and I was shocked at the way they sound, comfort in the ear for long periods of time, and the audio quality is much better than the stock iPhone earbuds. The pause/start buttons and volume control are very convenient as well. A great low cost alternative to the white earbuds that come with the iPhone...
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M. Racey

customer_reviews.title: Two fails in one year
customer_reviews.text: In brief, I purchased these in Feb 2011. The first pair lasted 7 months, the replacement pair just 3 months. In both cases, one of the earpieces lost sound. Customer Service was actually excellent and sent my first replacement very promptly with just the returned phones but without a receipt. I will attempt to get a second replacement as the 1 yr warranty is not up. I loved using these headphone more on the replacement set. Scosche had removed the fabric covering on the cables which caused all the stethoscoping noises. This redesign with smoother wires, although quieter, is perhaps less robust.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Im not one for long reviews. I find a few simple words can have just as big an impact as the long winded yet spot on reviews. With that said here it goes: Great sound Just enough bass so you don't go deaf The braided cord doesn't get snagged as much as the other kinds and it just always reliably works. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Italo La Posta

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with 3G iPhone (and sounds bad)
customer_reviews.text: Issue 01: Volume controls do not work on 3G and 3G iphones. (It only works on 3GS and 4G iphones) IF you iPhone does not record video (3GS + 4G feature) than the volume controls on this headphone will not work either. Issue 02: These headphones sound terrible, the bass was so muddy that it messes up all the of mids and highs. Ironically the cheaper version by Scosche actually sounds better in the sound checks I did. Save yourself some money and buy this cheaper alternative. Compliments: - I like the rope like wires that look like they won't get tangled - I like the chrome finish on the remote
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: First, there's no instructions as to which is left and which is right side. When placed in ear, the friction on the wire causes the scratchy noise and it's absolutely annoying when you have to move around. Controls are nice, rather large. If you're only sitting down to listen then this might work. Else, any slight movement or friction on the wire, it's SCRATCHY noise!!!
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: These are practically indestructible! Had them for years (sorry it took so long for the review) and they are still going strong! Sound quality is amazing for highs, lows and mids. Not tested for running since I just walk with them. Excellent for flights as well. Can't go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle/Bisugo

customer_reviews.title: Went through the washing machine and still works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after getting the iPhone on Verizon and have been very pleased with the quality of the head phones. Amazingly, they went through a washing machine cycle and after drying worked just fine. I figured they were toast, but not so! They're reasonably comfortable for long periods of time. I've had no complaints about the sound quality of my voice on phone calls either. The sound quality has been pretty good; however, I'm not an audio geek. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: B. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT sound, but stopped working too soon, in my opinion (about a year after purchase).
customer_reviews.author: Eddie G

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: It wastes your money! Because the quality isn't good! And it can't work now.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Freo

customer_reviews.title: Cord Noise and Microphone stops working sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: Edited Dec 22, 2010 - just an update that with daily use, the left ear bud has stopped working completely so these headphones are DONE. Like other reviewers mention, the noise the cord makes is really annoying just by rubbing against itself. On top of that, the noise cancelling aspect of the headphones, combined with no feedback on a cell phone means you can't really hear yourself talk and it's distracting and makes you yell. Finally, after about 2 weeks, my microphone just stops working sometimes. It drives me crazy. I hate these things. Listening to loud music while sitting still they sound great, though. Using these as your iphone headset, not so much!
customer_reviews.author: Annonymous

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second pair
customer_reviews.text: I am in Afghanistan again... and brought a pair of IDR655M's with me on my last trip. I now have an Ipad and wanted to keep a set of earbuds with it and without hesitation bought another pair. They sound great and are very comfortable. I bought my first pair before anyone had rated them on Amazon while is a rare thing for me to do any way I have no regrets and am sure you won't either.
customer_reviews.author: Pulln

customer_reviews.title: Will order another set...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite earbuds...fits my ears perfectly. Sound quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Middling
customer_reviews.text: I was initially put off by the 'feel' of the ear pieces but they are very comfortable once you get used to a pair that works for you. I was primarily pleased with these headphones except two huge points. 1. The remote does not work properly with the iPhone 4, play/pause is fine but volume is a no go. 2. After about a year the connection between the plug and cord became compromised so depending on the angle you get left, right, both, or no sound. They construction does seem to be fairly solid but this weak spot has ruined the headphones for me. I am now in the market for a new pair and will not consider these again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan J. Loveridge

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for everyday listening, making calls, and exercising. The long cord works well for keeping the phone in your pocket while running, biking, etc. The six sets of silicone buds make it easy to find a set that feels comfortable to you, and they block out external sound quite well. The only reason I gave them a 4-star review is that there is line noise when the cord rubs against your clothing, but a clip is included to help stop some rubbing, and I have yet to find a set of buds that don't have any line noise.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Scosche IDR655m Earphones
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased these earphones after being unsatisfied with the ones that came with my iPhone. In general they are much better than the ones that came with the phone, and they fit well which was an issue with the others. My main complaint is with the sound quality, especially the bass which is quite flat. The midrange and highs are better, but overall the sound seems dynamically flat. These earphones were apparently rated Best of Show in an ad in MacWorld magazine. In generally they're ok, and actually good for phone calls... just not quite the music experience I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D. Ross

customer_reviews.title: great headset
customer_reviews.text: These are really great! sound is excellent. base is strong and well rounded. not as boomy as some other headsets out there, but i dont like too much base anyhow. highs are crisp and clear without any trace of distortion what so ever. the only thing i must say, mids are not loud enough. the mid tones are very well defined, but sometimes, just not loud enough. controls are easy to feel and use, mic works just fine and picks up your voice very well without picking up background noise at the same time. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hrvoje

customer_reviews.title: Most of the functions do NOT work with my Androd
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphone set and sound quality is excellent however...volume controls do not work with my HTC One X+ with Android 4.2.2. Package and documentation reference apple products only, no android.
customer_reviews.author: ca8050

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing sounding but they break unreasonably fast
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing sounding but they break unreasonably fast. I bought three pairs of them before I finally gave up, 1 lasted less than a week. The other two lasted a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but eventually one ear stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, but eventually one ear stopped working, then a few months later the other one stopped. Worked for about a year though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kovacic

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Service
customer_reviews.text: This earphones offer a great sound for a decent price. The volume and track control does everything that apple's own earbuds do, complete with a microphone. Scosche's customer service is also amazing. I had an issue with my particular set of earbuds, which was no fault of theirs, but they still bent over backwards to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Livingston

customer_reviews.title: lasted almost two years
customer_reviews.text: I had these phones for almost two years, they worked well for the iphone and the in-ear part was comfortable. It wasn't tangle free, but it was easy to untangle most of the time. The wiring started to fatigue where it enters the iphone and so that's the part that stopped working. I'll probably buy another.
customer_reviews.author: moflicka

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, excellent recording with the microphone until. . . one day the microphone just stopped working. The headphones still work, but can't make any recordings. This with really minimal use (recording something once every few months)
customer_reviews.author: Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed earphones that provided noise isolation since I use them while doing yard work and when flying. I also wanted to keep the iPhone 4 controls that the oem buds have. These provide both while also sounding great. Bass response is better than any earphones I've had before. I've been using them about a month under pretty rough conditions and have had no problems. As others have noted, there is a little cord noise, but the cord sheathing that causes it is also what makes them durable. My oem cords started fraying after 2 days of working around the house. At this price, I don't see how you could do better.
customer_reviews.author: asiriusone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound, but cable will make noise if it moves while you are listening
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Left speaker went out
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I had durability issues with these headphones. After less than six months, the left speaker has gone out. This seems to be a problem with the wiring, as when I fiddle with the cable where it joins the plug, I'll get sound, but it won't last. Unfortunately, while I enjoyed the fit and sound from these earphones, I cannot recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: jimothy

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable earphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these to listen to audiobooks. They're comfortable and work well.
customer_reviews.author: EPHCALIF

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for listening to music, audiobooks or for answering and making calls on my iPhone. You can't beat the sound and functionality for the price. I have found Scosche to have excellent customer support,
customer_reviews.author: Keithken

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and the way they fit is wonderful. It blocks out almost all surrounding noise and comes with several ear "fitments". Comfortable and stay in place nicely. Great product for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: peachpebbles

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. I travel a lot and hate to hear flying noise. I had a pair of Shute headsets (cost twice as much) but read the reviews on these. Glad I bought them. The sound is very full and the earbud choices worked great. Since I travel I always have a lot of cords in my bag. The case is great in elimanating some of the clutter. The material the cord is made of does not get tied up as much. The remote works great with both my itouch and iPad. Great product especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Dapas

customer_reviews.title: Droid X Mic Compatability?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds with mic back in July, 2010 for use with a Blackberry Curve. It worked pretty well with the BB, the sound was somewhat better than the earbuds that came with the BB. I switched to a Droid X in October and have not been able to get the mic to work during phone calls. Also when listening to Pandora on the Droid X, the Play/Pause button on the screen sometimes flickers, like the earbuds are sending control signals the Droid X does not handle properly. Anyway, the set is decent if you are sure of compatibility, although not sure if worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MartyB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and effective
customer_reviews.text: These ear buds are comfortable and effectively block outside noise. In both cases they are the best of a half-dozen others I've tried. Sound reproduction leaves a little to be desired, which is why I gave four stars rather than five.
customer_reviews.author: ecotraveler

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a mid priced replacement for my old Sony's that died. They sound better than the Sony's for the same price but not fantastic. The controls are a bit bigger than I would like but not bad. The cord does create some annoying noise when walking but for listening to most music its not a big issue for me. Overall i think these headphones are worth the $40 i paid for them but not worth the $100 they originally cost. Im not disappointed with them but im not blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Don't put in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but my iPod goes into my pocket. Additionally I sit occasionally. These earphones have a half inch long inflexible post connected to the jack. The combination of these three things results in the wire breaking right where it connects to the post. The right earpiece has stopped functioning after less than 3 months. Totally not viable if you plan to actually use them with your player in your pocket while sitting.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gant

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about one month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earphones hoping the quality would be better than other earbuds I've purchased, but they were not. For some reason all my headphones, earbuds, and anything else I use to listen to music with gets a short in the cord and the sound stops working. These earphones were no different. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not for Android
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't use them. They were only for Apple products, not Andriod.
customer_reviews.author: COVID MAMA 2020

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound great and block out noise well. Was able to use lower volume than with other earbuds in gym and doing lawn work. Comfortable for entire workout. Wish I'd bought them years ago. Use with ipod and iphone
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Cable noise
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these earphones. Any movement at all transfers into the earpiece. They sound good as long as you don't make any movement. I have not experienced this with other earphones and have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - until they didn't
customer_reviews.text: I used these pretty often, as I listened to music throughout the entire marathon training season. I LOVED these headphones, but sadly, the left earbud just quit working now after about 11 months. They had even survived being drenched in a rainstorm 7 months ago with no real problem. They worked great, but I wish they would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hekman

customer_reviews.title: Oh well....
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money if you plan on actually "using" these earphones. I thought the earphones cord looked extremely "flimsy" when I received them in the mail - but thought I'd give them a try. Two months later - and I get a short in the left earphone... Finally - after a few days it stopped "shorting" out on me and quit working all together. I guess I should have just bought the iPhone earphones that came with the phone. The cord was also way too long and was always getting twisted and tangled...
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: brand loyalty - i loved it when i first got one thru costco
customer_reviews.text: brand loyalty - i loved it when i first got one thru costco. blocking out other noise is a must!
customer_reviews.author: Keita Ikeda

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this product almost 5 months back and occasionally used this product as I had the apple head phone for my iphone 3gs. After a while I started having a problem of hearing the sound only in one ear piece and also i feel electri shock to my years (kind of static feel). The end which I connect to iphone has some loose contact which gives lot of disturbance. I contacted the vendor for asking replacement or refund of money but did not even get a courtesy response. I don't recommend this product when you can get a better product in the market for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: Excellent In Ear Earphones
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I expected. I recently purchased an Iphone and wanted good sounding in ear earphones that had remote capabilities so I could control to the Ipod portion of the phone without taking the phone out of my pocket. These sound great and the remote works as advertised. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: We Myones

customer_reviews.title: very clear sound, but something is missing...
customer_reviews.text: these headphones have amazing sound, very crisp and clear. and plenty loud enough. i listen to rock and metal most of the time, so being able to hear every note picked on the guitar is pretty awesome. the only issue i have is that there isn't enough bass. sound good, yes. low end sound, so so. in my honest opinion, the trade off in low end bass is made up for in clarity and volume. would i buy these again? probably not. but definitely a good, solidly built set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: pfc.hays

customer_reviews.title: Earphones
customer_reviews.text: The Scosche Increased Dynamic Range Noise-Isolation Earphones were a big hit with the gentleman receiving the gift at Thanksgiving. Hopefully, they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: W. G. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Average sound quality, love the control and is well built
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is not as great as other headphones I have like Senheiser, but its still quite good. They adjust perfectly to my ears (I have weird ears and always have problems to fit properly the inserts - dont tell anyone) and provide great isolation so you dont need to turn the volume up in noisy environments (great for your ears). They look nice and tough and the controls work great to answer/hang up calls or to change volume or move back/forward in your track list. All of this for that price - I think is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work with regular phone headset jack
customer_reviews.text: I rarely leave any feedback, but I just can't figure out a way to make this simple thing work. It doesn't work with my iPhone; the mic doesn't work when I plug into my laptop; it doesn't even fit the regular phone (I have a panasonic one)headset jack... I don't know if I can return it since I already open it, but it just doesn't work at all...
customer_reviews.author: C. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But They Broke
customer_reviews.text: I've been enjoying these for a little over a year but now the sound keeps cutting in and out from the right ear bud. Looks like they were made to just outlast the 1 year warranty. The issue is with a poorly made plug. 3 stars for sound but 1 star for durability. And yes, cord rub noise is a noticeable issue with these. I live in NYC and am walking to/from home/subway/work and it's definitely noticeable but I got used to it over time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good set with inline mic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earphones on recommendation from a friend. The sound is fine but the thing I don't like about them is the inline microphone seams to pick up noise everytime the cables are touched. I guess this is what you have to deal with when you have a inline micropone but I wanted something I could use walking and jogging riding a bike etc.. so I got a pair of Westone1's. Love them just what I wanted. Both pair work well but just have different uses.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but, not up to date with apple or Samsung
customer_reviews.text: They're good but outdated for my phone and iPod none of the controls work.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soto

customer_reviews.title: These are honestly the best pair of headphones I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my Beats Tours and they by far go beyond my expectations. Bass is clear and not distorted, the INTapline works great and the microphone is separated from the buttons so the person you're talking to doesn't hear button pushing. Great pair of headphones at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Izaiah

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the best earbuds I've ever had. The are very comfortable to wear and don't slip out of your ear like a lot of earbuds have a tendency of doing. I'm also impressed with the bass, it has quite a kick. And of course the controls are nice and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best Bass I've Heard and Comfy Too
customer_reviews.text: Really love the bass with the double flange tips. Tried the traditional tips and didn't sound as rich. The braided cord is a nice touch. The fit in my ear is the most comfort I have experienced with an in-ear.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Awesome Sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement/upgrade for the headphones that came with my iPhone 3GS. I am amazed at the sound quality I'm getting from these. It's a real 'night and day' improvement over stock, and having a complete set of working buttons is a huge plus. This will sound odd, but perhaps my favorite feature is a little 'nub' on the side of the right headphone that makes it possible to determine left from right without having to see the little letters that most headphones have, it's pretty ingenious...
customer_reviews.author: Breylan

customer_reviews.title: good quality, price, and sound
customer_reviews.text: Wanted earbuds with mic and controls and this fit the bill and the price was cheap. Nuff said so just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: David Hosmer

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset for the price. Much more comfortable than the apple one that came with iPhone 4 but exactly the same functionality. The pouch that came with it is also really useful. Something that they don't mention is that it's made with some kind of fabric on the outside which is great to prevent the headset from getting entangled. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Scosche
customer_reviews.text: i bought these headphones about two months ago and have had no problems. the mic is sensitve enough to work without having to yell or talk directly in it. as for long ter durability only time can tell
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit. The only thing I would prefer is if the tapline control were located higher up (where the mic is) as that makes it easier to use the controls when wearing a jacket and having your device in an inside pocket.
customer_reviews.author: AO

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my V-MODA R's. The Scosche's have been great. I no longer have trouble with people being unable to hear me and the inbound audio quality is strong too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The headphones do not work with my wife's android phone. very disappointed with purchase. The description on Amazon doesn't mention this. Very deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Good control unit but not good sound
customer_reviews.text: The best aspect is the control unit, which is quite handy and works great. The sound is just slightly better than the headphones from Apple. The bass is not better and the high end is problematic as well. If I was listening to pop then it may be sufficient but it just is not good enough for rock or classical music. The cord noise is also annoying. I think I am getting a different set because the sound quality was just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chung

customer_reviews.title: OMG these are the BEST
customer_reviews.text: The best earphones I have ever owned. They are comfortable, easy to use, LOTS of features and at a reasonable price. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Super earphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones love the fact they give you a few ear pieces to fit your ears! Sound quality is great and they even give you a lovely case!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Cariello

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: They actually sound a little worse than my $20 ear buds. The controls and mic are big. The fabric covering the cord makes the cord kink up.
customer_reviews.author: Neal III

customer_reviews.title: Right speaker stopped working in under 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to doubt if there's actually such a thing as earbud style sets that don't give out in 6 months or less.
customer_reviews.author: KDH

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've listened to a lot of ear buds and the biggest problem is terrible bass response. Well, size really does matter when it comes to the drivers and bass responce. The over-sized drivers in these ear buds dramatically increase the bass! The high end is all there too. Finally a pair of earbuds that rival over-the-ear phones for sound. The controls work perfectly with my iPhone too. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: L. P. TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, good sound quality, reasonable ~10 dB sound reduction when fitted appropriately. On my HTC Sensation phone, only the middle button works to pause and start music and other two buttons are nonfunctional unless other apps are installed to make use of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ramin Herati

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE if you move even the slightest bit
customer_reviews.text: The headphones sounds good however that is ONLY if you sit still. I commute via bike so I wanted headphones that sound good for music but that I can also take a call with. When the cord moves or rubs against anything you can hear every last motion. It is really annoying. You can forget about using these to run or do any other type of non sedentary activity. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cherrycola

customer_reviews.title: Scosche...Really can't go wrong buying their product!
customer_reviews.text: Love 'em. Second pair I have owned from Scosche, first pair I put thru the ringer and they held up very well. I love that, when they fit in your ear they stay there and the sound is wonderful...I can crank it up (not even close to full) and they are plenty loud enough and the music sounds great. Best out there for the price I would have to believe.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mulholland

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had
customer_reviews.text: Love these... Dog chewed them up since so I will be reordering
customer_reviews.author: Tony D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are much better than I thought they would be; especially considering how affordable they are. I would definitely recommend them to music lovers. They are durable, very portable, and deliver music with tremendous quality.
customer_reviews.author: hark1493

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: The headphones quality are great. Although the picture shows them with the cloth braided cable, they do not. This is unfortunate because the -20 degree weather in North Dakota freezes the plastic cable and it becomes brittle to any bending. Other than that the product is great! Has a nice rumble in the ear but not lacking any other sounds.
customer_reviews.author: AquaGary

customer_reviews.title: Scosche makes great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Scosche earbuds from Amazon because they were a great price and the reviews were good. I am very satisfied with the quality and know I got a good deal. I have never owned earbuds with sound quality like these deliver. Great high end clarity and amazing low bass resonance.
customer_reviews.author: ryan@amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great earphone
customer_reviews.text: It has a awesome sound quality. I am very much satisfied with this. Bass is pretty good. I use it everyday for musics and calls, people gave feedback that they can hear me crystal clear, that means the mic is working perfectly. I strongly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: good headphones
customer_reviews.text: some good headphones. i bought them well over a year ago id say (possibly 2 years ago honestly) and they still work completely perfect. the sound is pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: Rico T

customer_reviews.title: Broken Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to my son and he liked the sound but I found them in his truck with the microphone broken. May not be high enough quality.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Only for apple products!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them on a great deal and good reviews, hoped that they would work with my Android phone, but turns out they're only compatible with a Apple products. Do not buy unless getting for Iproducts or a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Stiff cable
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, and nothing wrong with the sound quality, but I had to return these. The cable is so stiff that any movement at all between the cable and your face or shirt, and the "stethescope" effect overwhelms the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: They sound good
customer_reviews.text: These earphones sound great and are still working fine even after I accidentally ran with them in a downpour. The only thing I would change would be to make the tapline smaller and place it closer to the earphones like on the Apple version.
customer_reviews.author: Jernoodle

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: ear buds in general arent' worth it - the sound and construction are good quality - but it's only because i can't use them for running - i've tried every combination of buds that they came with and they don't stay in. i even went to 2 electronic stores and they couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: luckybuyer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE HEADPHONES! They do not have a PVC covering over the cord and as a result, the slightest movement sends vibration up the cord and straight into the earpiece. The noise is horrendous. I sent them back assuming it was a manufacturing fault. It wasn't. I didn't get a full refund because it was considered a "return" I couldn't find ANY phone-number contact to actually call and complain. It's a shame as they appear to be the only headset I can find that has the volume control AND a microphone- why there are not more I have no idea- and a simple PVC coating would make these headphones perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Died quick
customer_reviews.text: less than 3 months in the left headphone fizzled and died. I'm gentle with my buds, so am either victim of bad luck or crappy headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this few months ago. It worked fine until few days ago when it turned mono: loose connection at the junction of the tip to the wire is the most obvious cause. Not repairable. If I could give it a lesser rating I would. 50 bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Med A

product_meta.title: Scosche Increased Dynamic Range Noise-Isolation Earphones with tapLINE II Remote and Mic
product_meta.description:
Size:IDR655MScosche Increased Dynamic Range Noise-Isolation Earphones with tapLINE II Remote and Mic

AMAZON.COM



Scosche Increased Dynamic Range earphones accurately reproduce brilliant highs, silky smooth mids and powerful bass for all musical genres. These audiophile-grade earphones have been designed by audio enthusiasts for audio enthusiasts, to get the most out of any music--listen and you’ll hear the difference. The IDR655m are the top of the line offering from Scosche. With impressive 11mm drivers and a frequency response of 15 Hz - 20 kHz, it’s easy to hear the difference. The IDR655m’s also feature a cable length of 52 inches, with a non-tangling nylon braided jacket.

TAPLINE II CONTROL
The integrated tapLINE II control surface gives you complete control without touching your device. You can play, pause, adjust volume, skip tracks and much more, all from the tapLINE II control surface. Adjust volume by pressing the + and – buttons or control your music and video playback--including play/pause and next/previous--by pressing the center button. The remote is centrally located at the Y junction for easy visibility and use, and the microphone is located inline on the right channel for optimal performance.

SERIOUSLY MAC-FRIENDLY
The tapLINE II controls are compatible with the recently released iPad, iPhone 3GS, iPod nano (Gen 5), iPod shuffle (Gen 3), iPod touch (Gen 2), iPod nano (Gen 4), iPod classic 120GB & 160GB (2009) and Mac computers purchased after Oct 2008. You can also navigate playlists and activate the VoiceOver feature on the iPod shuffle (Gen 3). The integrated microphone allows for handsfree conversations, voice command and recording voice memos on the iPad, iPhone 3GS, iPod nano (Gen 5), iPod touch (Gen 2), iPod nano (Gen 4), iPod classic 120GB & 160GB (2009) and Mac computers purchased after Oct 2008.

INCLUDED ACCESSORIES
Scosche IDR655m’s include small, medium and large single and dual flanged silicone inserts. Match the size to your ears, for unparalleled noise isolation and comfort. The included sheepskin leather travel pouch keeps your earphones and inserts neatly tucked away when not in use.

ENJOY THE BEST
At CES 2010, Scosche received the prestigious "Best of Show 2010 Finalist" award for the IDR655m model from leading tech website iLounge.com. iLounge covers “All things iPod, iPhone, iPad and Beyond” and is an “independent provider of information about Apple Inc.'s iPod, iPhone and iPad digital media players, accessories, and related software”.

ABOUT SCOSCHE
Scosche Industries is an award-winning innovator of car audio installation hardware as well as portable electronics accessories. Scosche was founded on its commitment to quality, value and customer service. With 30 years of passion and innovation, we have invented successfully developed leading-edge products. Scosche owns over 70 patents and trademarks worldwide and continues to win industry awards for our relentless drive to create unique and innovative products. Scosche accessories are designed, developed and tested by our user-innovation team of consumer electronic fanatics. As a result our products work better, look nicer and are the most innovative on the market today. Our unique lines of accessories include everything you need to listen, power, protect and connect your personal media devices to your lifestyle. Scosche is still 100% family owned and operated with over 120 great people alongside them.
feature_bullets: Oversized 11 mm drivers accurately reproduce brilliant highs silky smooth mids and powerful bass for all musical genres
Control music and video playback; including play/pause and next/previous by pressing the center button
Integrated microphone for hands-free conversations, voice command, or recording voice memos
S/M/L single and dual flanged silicone inserts provide unparalleled noise isolation and comfort
Includes genuine sheep skin travel pouch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars227 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
